S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-2903 ; adding init() to sysinfo.Main.java's call to LocalizedResource.getInstance() ensures that if sysinfo has a clean one that does not get affected by any earlier calls to init. After this, the redirections of system.out work correctly in a loop, so adjusting the test to do away with the hoky annotating and unraveling of the output; also now sequence of tests in tools._Suite no longer matters.
